segments.text: Miss , please give something to drink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , sir . What kind of drink do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but you have to pay for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , in that case please give me some free drink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a minute , I will bring you some juice .
segments.speaker: S2
